title: Hafiz : the Tongue of the hidden / an attempt to transfuse into English rubáiyát the spirit of the Persian poet, as felt by Clarence K. Streit; with a foreword, a proem, an epilogue, a sketch of the life of Hafiz and a note on this adaptation.
author: Ḥāfiẓ, active 14th century.

title: Poems from the Divan of Hafiz,
author: Hāfiz, 14th cent.
